quotes.statistical_relevance: **Statistical relevance:** Illustrates significant negative impact (economic devastation) and dismisses any potential positive aspects as highly uncertain, reinforcing the maximal negative sentiment of Document 1.
statistical_targets: Perfect negative correlation between positive and negative sentiment
Extreme opposite sentiment scores across the two documents
Perfect negative correlation between positive and negative sentiment
Extreme opposite sentiment scores across the two documents
curated_evidence.curation_instructions: Review all evidence from both documents. Curate quotes that best exemplify the maximal positive sentiment (doc 0) and maximal negative sentiment (doc 1). The goal is to create a clear, illustrative dataset showing why the model produced a perfect negative correlation.
